snippet.title: Noshir Dalal on playing Charles in RDR2, Jubei in Ghost of Yotei & Bode in Star Wars Jedi Survivor
snippet.description:
Dan sits down with legendary voice and performance capture actor Noshir Dalal (known for Bode Akuna in Star Wars Jedi: Survivor, Kotallo in Horizon, Jubei in Ghost of Yotei and Charles in Red Dead Redemption 2). They discuss his iconic roles, the craft of performance capture, his candid thoughts on the recent Actors' Strike and so much more!

Follow Noshir:
https://www.instagram.com/noshirdalal/

Timestamps:
0:00 - Intro
1:33 - Welcome Noshir
3:40 - What Games does Noshir play?
5:35 - Horizon Zero Dawn and Forbidden West
7:24 - Hollow Knight talk
8:40 - Kotallo in Horizon Forbidden West
9:54 - Critical Role Experience & Does Noshir get nervous?
14:04 - Hilarious Green Soup Story
17:33 - Stunt for Games
19:07 - Noshir‚Äôs Kid, Food, Health and Lifestyle
23:51 - Noshir is an Underrated Actor
26:17 - Most Game Actors aren't rich
28:33 - The Actors Strike
33:02 - CEOs of Gaming Companies
34:46 - The Results of the Strike against AI
39:08 - The Order 1886
40:58 - Zeyad Khalil in Black Ops 3
46:20 - Jubei in Ghost of Yotei
57:27 - Working with Erika Ishii
1:03:33 - Working with Suzie Yeung
1:04:41 - Bode in Star Wars Jedi Survivor
1:08:00 - Noshir opens up about his struggles
1:14:50 - Is Bode a Bad Man?
1:26:41 - Charles in Red Dead Redemption 2
1:40:12 - Sekiro in Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
1:46:14 - Japanese Pronunciation in Games
1:49:28 - Mysterio in Marvel‚Äôs Spider-Man 2
1:56:41 - Noshir gives an emotional speech
